title: About V
abouttext: V is an audio engineer with a Bachelor of Science in Music Business, Entrepreneurship, & Technology from The University of the Arts.  Growing up, music was always a large part of her life. From piano lessons to voice lessons and later developing a deep love for theatre and the performing arts it became clear that the rest of her life would revolve around music. As she got older and ultimately made her way to a University she decided that music and event production was her biggest passion.
contacttext: Mixing Services Available - Contact Me for Details!
